about_the_game:
The PPDS Digital Supporter Duck grants access to various digital goodies, enhancing your duck-filled relaxation with exclusive content such as the artbook, wallpapers, and exclusive music.

But remember: YOU DON'T NEED THIS.

You can fully enjoy the game without getting the Digital Supporter Duck. This only exists for those who want to give extra support to the ducks!

- Music: Hippospace Download OST
A curated selection of tracks created specifically for Placid Plastic Duck Simulator, yet to be released on other platforms, and accurately remastered for that extra crispy sound!

Tracklist:
01 - SPACE_0
02 - Floating in space
03 - Houston, we don't have a problem
04 - Chronicles of the Deep Water (King Dubby)
05 - Floating forever
06 - Pietra

- High-Resolution Wallpapers
Exclusive backgrounds bring the duck-filled universe with all its charm to your PC (or room, if you feel like printing).

- Digital Artbook
From the initial scribbles to the final masterpiece, witness our artistic journey in an extensive artbook with a foreword and comments by none other than myself.

How to access the digital goodies
All digital treasures can be found in the Steam installation directory of the game in the folder "Digital Supporter Duck" (Steam\SteamApps\common\Placid Plastic Duck Simulator) after completing the download of the "Digital Supporter Duck" DLC package.

English*, Italian, Japanese, Spanish - Spain, French, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, German, Ukrainian, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
